channel.title: Posts on Ron's Engineering Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ron's Engineering Journal

item.title: Week 1: Robot
item.description:
Welcome to my blog. Here I aim to write biweekly chronicles of what I am up to.

This inaugural post will (briefly) document the assembly of my robot for the ENPH253 course.

Fig. 1. Debouncer circuit by me.

This was one of many circuits used by the robot. Buttons tend to be “bouncy” and provide multiple outputs per press, so this board would smooth out the signal to a single rising edge.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hello

Here is my first post, at least the first that made it out of local testing and into deployment.

I will update this blog weekly with chronicles of my escapades as well as those less exciting things called projects.

Thanks to Steven Chen for inspiring me to start this and helping set it up.

Below I will test various Hugo and markdown features.

Picture of me on Golden Ears
